title: Rigid Transformations for Stabilized Lower Dimensional Space to Support Subsurface Uncertainty Quantification and Interpretation. (arXiv:2308.08079v1 [cs.LG])
abstract: Subsurface datasets inherently possess big data characteristics such as vast volume, diverse features, and high sampling speeds, further compounded by the curse of dimensionality from various physical, engineering, and geological inputs. Among the existing dimensionality reduction (DR) methods, nonlinear dimensionality reduction (NDR) methods, especially Metric-multidimensional scaling (MDS), are preferred for subsurface datasets due to their inherent complexity. tldr: 该论文介绍了一种用于地下数据集的稳定降维方法，通过刚性变换实现了欧几里德不变表示，能够量化地下数据的不确定性并且适应外样本点的扩展。
